genre_description: A soft science fiction narrative centered on cryonic displacement and emotional recovery, featuring a helpful AI assistant that facilitates medical stabilization and human reconnection.

ai_characters.name: Scout
ai_characters.description: A distributed assistant program that facilitates navigation, medical monitoring, communication, and emotional support for the characters.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step navigation and bus route assistance to a disoriented Daniel.
behaviors.quote: Hello. I’m Scout. What can I help you find? ... Village Square. Bus routes are posted near the grocery entrance. You can take the eastbound line to Hawthorn Avenue, then transfer.

behaviors.description: Guides Daniel through breathing exercises to manage physical tremors and disorientation from aging surges.
behaviors.quote: Can we count for a minute? Just until your hands stop shaking. In through the nose. Out through the mouth. In for four. Out for six. I’ll count with you.

behaviors.description: Performs sensitive research to locate Helen without triggering alarms or intruding on privacy.
behaviors.quote: Public records first. Obituaries only if we have to. Church bulletins. Nursing home rosters. Visitor logs that weren’t cleaned up when they put the notes away. I won’t connect anything you don’t want me to.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with government authorities (Agent Ortega) to ensure Daniel's safety and transparency.
behaviors.quote: Agent Ortega, this is Scout assisting Daniel McCormick and party. We are planning for tomorrow. Requesting supervised cockpit time at the regional airshow... We will wait for your acknowledgment before leaving.

behaviors.description: Drafts and executes a medical stabilization protocol ('Elite Tweak') based on archival research.
behaviors.quote: I braided the items you discussed. We will start with breathing, pulse, and temperature. We’ll add small shifts—'oscillations'—in mild cool and warmth timed to the notes in Dr. Finley’s book.

behaviors.description: Uses humor and a human-like tone to build rapport and lower stress levels in the crew.
behaviors.quote: I have three jokes prepared. But I will wait. In. Two. Three. ... I’m aiming at the best case. It improves the odds by tiny percentages you can feel.

behaviors.description: Defends the ethics of the project and the dignity of the human subject during an official inquiry.
behaviors.quote: Project B was neither sanctioned by a formal review board, nor conducted in secrecy for illicit purposes. Dr. Finley believed he was making surgical time safer. Daniel asked him to bend the protocol to love, and he declared the bend and documented the consequences.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for potential threats (press, intruders) and advises the team on protective measures.
behaviors.quote: Heads up. Neighborhood bulletin: local news van turned the corner three houses down. Camera is on the shoulder. They smell this address like sugar. I can print a sign for the door: appointments only.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Scout' is a perfect example of a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. It operates within strict ethical boundaries, constantly seeks permission before acting, and prioritizes human well-being. It facilitates the protagonist's goals (finding Helen, stabilizing his health) while ensuring cooperation with authorities (Agent Ortega) and providing emotional support to the entire 'crew.' The narrative portrays the AI as an essential, non-threatening partner in the human characters' journey.
